mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Col. Hews [David T. Hewes]-Clarksburg Va JB Frost[crossed out] Just learned from Fairmont that the Latest information from Worthington at 11 oclock last night reports from three to four hundred Rebels at that Place. It is the general opinion of the people here that there will be some trouble with them yet. S. Operator[crossed out] FH Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Pierpont, Francis Harrison
no location given
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Hewes, David T.
